name.ja: <ruby>炎<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>獣<rt>じゅう</rt></ruby> キリン

text.en: During the Main Phase, if this card is in your hand (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1 other FIRE monster in your hand or face-up field, and if you do, Special Summon this card. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Fire King" monster from your hand or GY, except "Fire King High Avatar Kirin", then you can destroy 1 card on the field. You can only use each effect of "Fire King High Avatar Kirin" once per turn.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck R: Onslaught of the Fire Kings
